org.ecoinformatics.seek.ecogrid

Class MetadataSpecificationInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ecoinformatics.seek.ecogrid.MetadataSpecificationInterface
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ADNMetadataSpecification, DarwinCoreMetaDataSpecification, EML2MetadataSpecification

    public abstract class MetadataSpecificationInterface
extends java.lang.Object

    Title:PlugInQueryTransferInterface

    Description: This is a plugin interface and it defines a all methods any metadata type should implement into order to search ecogrid service and parse the results

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

    Company:

    Author:
    not attributable
    Created:
    February 17, 2005
